title: Huge FPS drops
body:
I've been going from 100FPS to 1 - 5 FPS, only in League of Legends :P

Does reinstalling help?

replies.body: Reinstalling could certainly help if the frame drops are impacted by bad game files.  There could be outdated drivers as well.  My suggestion would be to just go through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to rule out possibilities.  Test it in a custom game, though!
